text: John Shrapnel (27 April 1942 â€“ 14 February 2020) was an English actor. He was born in Birmingham, Warwickshire. His best known roles were as Mr. Skinner in 101 Dalmatians (1996), as Senator Gaius in Gladiator (2000) and as Nestor in Troy (2004). Shrapnel died on 14 February 2020 at his London home from cancer, aged 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from Birmingham
title: John Shrapnel
